description: Renders a simple flowchart or journey map with cards connected horizontally or vertically.

fields.title: Optional heading shown above the flow.
fields.subtitle: Optional rubric text.
fields.body: Optional array of paragraph strings that appear before the flowchart.
fields.steps: Array of objects defining each stage.

stepSchema.title: Short label for the stage.
stepSchema.icon: Font Awesome icon class for the step badge.
stepSchema.actions: Optional array passed to a helper list for actions or sub-steps.

steps.title: Listen
steps.description: Reflect back what you heard and label the feeling.

steps.title: Assess
steps.description: Check for immediate risks and the support needed.

steps.title: Decide
steps.description: Offer two options and co-author the next step.
